item.title: These are the 4 big things we're watching in the stock market in the week ahead
item.description: In the week ahead, another great American tech giant — Club name Nvidia — will be in the spotlight.

item.title: Intuit tops Wall Street estimates after tax season, issues strong guidance
item.description: Intuit reported better-than-expected results for the fiscal third quarter and also beat estimates with its full-year forecast.

item.title: Snowflake shares soar to highest level in over a year as revenue tops $1 billion for first time
item.description: Snowflake shares popped on Thursday after the data analytics company reported better-than-expected earnings and revenue.

item.title: Xpeng shares rise, adding to 66% rally after the Chinese EV maker's losses narrowed
item.description: Xpeng said it expects to deliver between 102,000 and 108,000 of its electric cars in the second quarter of this year.

item.title: Canada Goose shares soar nearly 20% as company beats estimates, pulls full-year guidance
item.description: Shares of Canada Goose rose 20% after the company reported fiscal fourth-quarter earnings that beat analysts' estimates.
